availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram H. Smith (Master C. M. R/Webster Co.)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer and Master Commissioner. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Rice Smith. Father of Ben F. Smith, Rachael D. Smith, Charles Smith, John Smith, and Willie Smith. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 78. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Dixon, Subdivision 166, p. 8. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910). Microfilm rolls #994027-994058. Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky.
